mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into t_user (user_name, display_name, `password`, email, phone, auth_type, role_id, user_dn, create_date, bxemp) values (#{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{displayName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{authType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{roleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userDn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bxemp,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update t_user set user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, display_name = #{displayName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `password` = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, auth_type = #{authType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, role_id = #{roleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_dn = #{userDn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bxemp = #{bxemp,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, user_name, display_name, `password`, email, phone, auth_type, role_id, user_dn, create_date, bxemp from t_user where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, user_name, display_name, `password`, email, phone, auth_type, role_id, user_dn, create_date, bxemp from t_user
